name: Online Cinema and Event Booking Script
short_description:
Our script can manage movie and event details, ticket rate and show time. We offer user friendly Ajax search field so the user can easily able to know about the movie release and make the choice of event. 

We have a very powerful system to manage seats, movie and booking user details. It accepts payment online, manage reservation and events. We always care for system security, portability and database optimization.

We have three different modules in our script:
1. Counter module
2.Theater Owner Module
3.Website Admin Module

Our entire system can manage by any webmaster without needing much technical knowledge they can customize. PHP scripts mall ticket booking script is search engine friendly it adds better aspects of search engine. The entire structure is easily managed through the well prepared admin panel. Our Online Cinema and Event Booking Script saves your precious time completely helps in your business prosperity.

Make a Call: India – (+ 91) – 9841300660
summary: Online booking script aims to help the people to book cinemas or event
